title: Colin.McRae.Rally-[P]-ALI213
description:
Colin.McRae.Rally-[P]-ALI213





Release Info:

Release Date: July 31, 2014
Genre: Racing, Sports
Developer: Codemasters Digital
Publisher: Codemasters
Platform: PC
Details: Click Here
Game Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish
VoiceLanguage: English
Publication Type: pirates
Crack: Integrated (ALI213)


System Requirements:

OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 or Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 1.6 GHz or AMD Equivalent
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Video Card: Nvidia 6800 or ATI X1300 or Intel HD3000
Hard disk space: 1 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Device

Game information:

Racing game number 1 in 83 countries!
Hit the mileage on the road to a perfect
game with off-road racing Colin McRae Rally.
Established developers franchise with millions of copies sold,
and based on the content received a rating of 90% on the website
Metacritic game Colin McRae Rally 2.0, Colin McRae Rally game is
amazing THIRTY stages of the rally with a total length of 130
kilometers. Racing at top speed through the dust and dirt of
the Australian bush, throw a big challenge rises in the mountains
of Greece and wade in cramped and winding roads of Corsica.

Game Features:

CARS:

Get behind the wheel of four legendary rally cars,
such as the Subaru Impreza, Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution VI,
Lancia Stratos and Ford Focus Colin McRae. Comments,
articulated by a professional rally co-driver Nicky Grist,
to help you successfully pass all stages.

MANAGEMENT:

Along with the critically acclaimed model management,
damage and physics in the game Colin McRae Rally,
feel the thrill of high-speed driving on different
types of road surfaces and gorgeous and requiring
considerable exertion places.

CHALLENGE:

Choose from multiple game modes including quick race,
a full-scale rallies and championships. Various control
schemes and review modes let you get the unforgettable
experience of the game. Publish your best results in time
to the leaderboard and unlock achievements.

Installation information:
1 Download
2 Start the game (CMR.exe)
3 Play
